name: bp-markdown
description: Adds Markdown support for BuddyPress/BuddyBoss Platform content (activities, comments, etc.).
author: Allen Day

scripts.package: npm run plugin-zip && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8')); const oldName = 'bp-markdown.zip'; const newName = `bp-markdown-${pkg.version}.zip`; if (fs.existsSync(oldName)) { fs.renameSync(oldName, newName); console.log(`Renamed ${oldName} to ${newName}`); } else { console.log('bp-markdown.zip not found'); }"
